title: The Blind Spots of Artificial Intelligence in Skin Cancer Diagnosis
details: K Frasier, MG Hash, N Werpachowski, H Fritts
abstract: Artificial intelligence (AI) has emerged as a promising tool in the detection of skin cancer, particularly melanoma, through the use of deep learning algorithms trained on vast datasets of dermoscopic images. While early results suggest that AI systems …

title: Advancing Radiological Dermatology with an Optimized Ensemble Deep Learning Model for Skin Lesion Classification
details: A Akram, T Akram, G Atteia, S Alanzai, A Qahmash… - 2025
abstract: Advancements in radiation-based imaging and computational intelligence have significantly improved medical diagnostics, particularly in dermatology. This study presents an ensemble-based skin lesion classification framework that integrates …
